field_speakers.processed: Professor Thomas Berger, Professor of International Relations, Boston University; Director BU Center for the Study of Asia

field_organizers.processed: Boston University Center for the Study of Asia

field_description.processed:
Please join in the final 2022 talk in BUCSA's series of Taiwan: Culture, Society and Politics.

Taiwan is a vibrant and successful democracy and a bold showcase for what modern East Asia looks like. At the same time, it is sitting on one of the worldâ€™s most precarious geopolitical fault lines. This program is designed to give participants a glimpse into the social, cultural, and political realities of Taiwan today.
